decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:

PP-126-7704v1; A-EX-EA-022-EL-300; A-EX-EA-022-EL-301; A-EX-EA-022-EL-310; A-EX-EA-022-EL-310; A-EX-EA-022-PL-100 Rev 01; A-EX-EA-022-PL-101; A-EX-EA-022-PL-110 Rev 01; A-EX-EA-022-PL-111; A-EX-EA-022-S-200; A-EX-EA-022-S-210; A-EX-EA-022-BP-002 Rev 01; DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT 01 DECEMBER 2023; HERITAGE STATEMENT 01 20/12/2023; PARKING PROVISION 01 20/12/2023

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Details of the replacement windows hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the development is commenced (except site clearance, demolition and ground works) and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The details shall include 1:20 cross sectional drawings, materials, transoms, glazing, fixings and ironmongery. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the development harmonises with the character and appearance of the dwelling and would preserve the special character and appearance of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area, in accordance with the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area Management Plan (2008), policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Conversion of garage into habitable room involving replacing garage door with window
